name: Scolipede
flavorText:
With quick movements, it chases down
its foes, attacking relentlessly with
its horns until it prevails.

previous.name: Whirlipede
previous.flavorText:
Protected by a hard shell, it spins
its body like a wheel and crashes
furiously into its enemies.

next.name: Cottonee
next.flavorText:
When attacked, it escapes by shooting
cotton from its body. The cotton serves
as a decoy to distract the attacker.

pokemon.name: Venipede
pokemon.flavorText:
Its bite injects a potent poison, enough
to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try
to prey on it.

pokemon.name: Whirlipede
pokemon.flavorText:
Protected by a hard shell, it spins
its body like a wheel and crashes
furiously into its enemies.
